## arrayEach() function

遍历数组，返回 false 中断遍历(支持continue和break操作)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function arrayEach<V>(array: ArrayLike<V>, iterator: (val: V, idx: number, arr: ArrayLike<V>) => boolean | void, reverse?: boolean): void;
```
